entry.name: jQuery.boxModel
entry.title: jQuery.boxModel
entry.desc: Deprecated in jQuery 1.3 (see jQuery.support). States if the current page, in the user's browser, is being rendered using the W3C CSS Box Model.

example.desc: Returns the box model for the iframe.
example.code: $("p").html("The box model for this iframe is: " + jQuery.boxModel + "");

example.desc: Returns false if the page is in Quirks Mode in Internet Explorer
